name: Marriott Karachi

reviews.text: I visited Karchi in May 2003 and stayed at the Marriott. The hotel was in a nicer part of Karachi, just next to the American Embassy.
reviews.title: Marriott Karachi
Good memories
reviews.text: The hotel itself was not up to par with Marriott hotels that you would find in the United States, but for Karachi I guess it was a very good hotel.

description: Karachi Marriott Hotel. Situated in the Heart of the city.
